description: The StringUtil utility class is an all-static class with methods for working with String objects. You do not create instances of StringUtil; instead you call methods such as the StringUtil.substitute() method.

values: str The string to make substitutions in.
rest Additional parameters that can be substituted
New string with all of the {n} tokens

members.description: Returns a string consisting of a specified string concatenated with itself a specified number of times.

values: str The string to be repeated.

members.description: Removes "unallowed" characters from a string. A "restriction string" such as "A-Z0-9" is used to specify which characters are allowed. This method uses the same logic as the restrict property of TextField. that are not allowed by the restriction string.

values: The input string, minus any characters

members.description: Removes all whitespace characters from the beginning and end of the specified string.   beginning and end.

values: str The String whose whitespace should be trimmed.
Updated String where whitespace was removed from the

members.description: Removes all whitespace characters from the beginning and end of each element in an Array, where the Array is stored as a String.    beginning and end of each element.

values: value The String whose whitespace should be trimmed.
separator The String that delimits each Array element in the string.
Array where whitespace was removed from the

members.description: Removes all whitespace characters from the beginning and end of each element in an Array, where the Array is stored as a String.    beginning and end of each element.

values: value The String whose whitespace should be trimmed.
separator The String that delimits each Array element in the string.
Updated String where whitespace was removed from the

members.description: Returns true if the specified string is a single space, tab, carriage return, newline, or formfeed character. a single space, tab, carriage return, newline, or formfeed character.

values: str The String that is is being queried.

members.description: Removes word from a String and return the new result string

values: str The String to be modified.
wordToSeach The word string to search and remove from str
